name: Titans Slayer: 3D Action Game
description:
Alarm! Titans have invaded the city! There is nobody who can stop them, but you! What are you waiting for? Get up off the couch, put on your tight latex suit and start fighting giants! The greedy monsters are about to see a real hero in action.

Titans Slayer is a fun 3D action-adventure game, where you should defeat mighty titans in 1vs1 battles. Now it is only you vs King Kong vs Godzilla vs aliens. Do you have what it takes to stay alive?

Run around the arena, grab everything you can find and throw it at the tap titans! Use TNT and oil barrels, destroyed helicopters and even cows! Want more power? Find super-duper weapons, use boosters, and defeat mega monsters x10 faster!

The gameplay is quite easy. Tap on the screen and hold to make the stickman superhero move in the arena. Swipe across the screen to evade the concrete blocks, pieces of earth and other objects that the tap titans throw at you.

Why you will love this fun tapping game

- Unstoppable fun gameplay
- Many levels to beat
- Challenging titans & monsters
- Tons of cools skins
- Beautiful graphics

Only a true superhero can save the city. Download the Titans Slayer now and launch a full-scale attack on titans.
